name: Spider Infestation
dialogs: It's a nightmare in there! Spiders everywhere, some bigger than dogs!
My workers refuse to go in, and we have valuable cargo trapped inside.
We need someone brave enough to clear out these monstrous arachnids.
You're making great progress! The workers are feeling more hopeful.
Destroying those nests should prevent new spiders from multiplying.
The Spider Queen is dead! The infestation is finally over!
My workers can return safely, and business can get back to normal. Thank you!
